text:
I extracted the php-5.1.4-Win32.zip package from php.net to c:\PHP and installed
apache_2.0.58-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi from the Apache site.                       
              I also set my Path variable to point to C:\PHP.                  
                 I copied the php5ts.dll to the Apache2 directory under Program
Files                  Copied the php.ini file to c:\Windows                   
                          Copied php5apache2.dll to c:\windows\system32        
                               Made changes to httpd.conf file (Attached)      
                                  But when i start apache I get this error : 

Syntax error on line 174 of C:/Program Files/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/httpd.conf:
Invalid LoadModule path \x93C:/PHP/php5apache2.dll\x94
Note the errors or messages above, and press the <ESC> key to exit

Please advise on what I could be missing here
creator: jay@quedge.com
jay@quedge.com
text:
Created attachment 18564
Apche config file for windows

Please use an appropriate support forum.  This is for bugs.

It looks like you (or your editor) has inserted some junk in your httpd.conf.
creator: nick@webthing.com
